page.title: 04A CHILD'S DAY IN MARLBOROUGH
page.content: I get up at 7 o'clock and then I have my wash and get dressed. I usually have Rice Krispies for Breakfast then I get ready for school. Sometimes if it's raining I come with Daddy in the car. Then we sit on the mat and talk about news, then we get on with our work. My favourite is maths. It is an hour before we have milk. When we have had milk we go out and have play. When we come in from play we listen to stories, then we do another hour of work. Sometimes we read. When we have done our work, we have lunch. Then we have another play. Then we do two more hours of work, then have prayers and go home. Sometimes I have somebody to tea or I go out and have tea.
